ceo_message.title: Message from the CEO
ceo_message.subtitle: We built this for you.
ceo_message.paragraph_1: I'm Manny, the founder and CEO of Blue. I created Blue to address the challenges I faced while scaling my consultancy. Turns out — many people struggle to stay organized and streamline their business processes.
ceo_message.paragraph_2: The central idea is that Blue is easy to use, so your team actually use it. We have all wasted money on software platforms that promised much but failed to deliver: they are rigid, awkward, and take forever to understand.
ceo_message.paragraph_3: Blue is different — It's super easy to use, incredibly flexible, and yet powerful enough for serious work. And the great thing is that you don't have to change your processes! Blue adapts to your existing processes — giving you visibility, automations, and peace of mind. You'll sleep well at night knowing that nothing slips through the cracks.
ceo_message.paragraph_4: So that's why I built Blue — because there is no company with a simple solution for scaling operations, without all the fluff.
ceo_message.paragraph_5: Thanks for reading, and I hope you enjoy using Blue!
ceo_message.paragraph_6: I know that we enjoy building it!
ceo_message.name: Emanuele Faja

why_different.title:
Why Blue is different
from other platforms.
why_different.description: We've built Blue from the ground up with a different philosophy. One that puts simplicity, flexibility, and customer success at the core of everything we do.
why_different.point_1_desc: We've felt your pain. Blue was born from real-world experience scaling businesses, not venture capital boardrooms pushing growth at any cost.
why_different.point_2_title: Simple enough for everyone, powerful enough for enterprises
why_different.point_2_desc: Your team will actually use Blue because it's intuitive. Yet it scales effortlessly from 5 to 5,000 users without architectural changes.
why_different.point_3_title: Adapts to you, not the other way around
why_different.point_3_desc: We don't force you into rigid workflows. Blue molds to your existing processes while giving you the tools to improve them over time.

awards.title: Awards & Recognition
awards.description: Trusted by thousands of teams worldwide and recognized by industry leaders.

funding.title: Funding
funding.description: We're backed by the most demanding investors in the world: our customers.
funding.paragraph_1: While others chase venture capital, we've chosen a different path. We're proudly bootstrapped, which means we answer to our customers, not to a board room. This independence allows us to focus on building the best product possible, make decisions for the long term, and maintain the company culture that got us here.
funding.paragraph_2: Every customer who believes in our vision. Every team that trusts us with their workflows. Every person who chose Blue over the heavily-funded alternatives. You're not just users – you're partners in building something sustainable.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.2018_desc: Founded in response to the challenges of scaling a consultancy. The vision: make process management delightful.
timeline.2019_desc: Blue's first customer validates the vision. The journey from concept to reality begins.
timeline.2020_desc: Word spreads about Blue's unique approach. Teams love the simplicity and power combination.
timeline.2021_desc: API launches with 100% feature coverage, enabling powerful integrations and automation capabilities.
timeline.2022_desc: Bloo becomes Blue, marking a new chapter in our journey with a refreshed brand identity.
timeline.2024_desc: Enterprise features including White Label, advanced permissions, and API v2 help Blue scale to enterprise customers.
timeline.2025_desc: Committed to our mission: organize the world's work by building the best process management platform on the planet.
